changelog.change: Added Quitout splits (and "On quitout" variations to many existing splits).
Added an internal version converter (allowing you to safely open layout files from earlier versions of the autosplitter).
Fixed bonfire state-based splits ("On light" and kindling).
Ending splits now split on credits (rather than when the cutscene begins).
Game time now properly resets to zero when the timer is reset in-game.
The main splits window in the UI now automatically scrolls to newly-added splits.
Scroll wheel no longer affects dropdowns.
"Key item" splits (including keys, embers, bonfire items, and key boss souls) now work. This should fix other item splits as well.
Added Lloyd's Talisman to item splits (under Consumables).
Quitout splits now have an associated numeric textbox (defaults to one).
Deferred memory checks until the player is loaded for the first time (this should hopefully improve the stability of all splits).
Item tracking will now continue to function following a game crash.
